attributes.action: Withdraw the literacy and numerarcy test for PGCE,QTS postgraduates
attributes.additional_details:
To withdraw the implementation of literacy and numeracy tests for postgraduate PGCE,OTS or reduce the re-sit period of two years.
What other profession has a bench mark test for literacy and numeracy that does not consider your  level of academic entry grades which can then effect your future professional career. Presently the government requires you to wait two years to re-sit these tests so ineffect your career can be defered for two years regardless of yor teaching practice and course assessment grades.The tests do not reflect the quality or standard of teaching implemented by trainee teachers.
